summary: This is an email fragment from July 24, 2019, discussing workplace communication inefficiencies and referencing Jeffrey Epstein. The sender expresses frustration about a colleague's redundant email practices and questions why they are being asked to forward Epstein-related information instead of their boss handling it directly.

events.title: Email about Epstein forwarded
events.description: The email author questions why they are being instructed to send Epstein-related information to someone, suggesting it should be their boss's responsibility.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 24, 2019, discussing workplace communication.
The email references Jeffrey Epstein, indicating the correspondence is related to his case.
The author expresses frustration about being tasked with forwarding Epstein-related information, questioning their boss's role.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and has internal identifiers (SDNY_00011769, EFTA00139756).
